name: ULTRATORO
description:
Ultratoro is a fast-paced driving game where the tracks have the shape of a donut.
In Ultratoro you will…

Drive at full speed

An arcade racer like no other.
Experience a unique gameplay loop in a surreal non-euclidean universe.
Challenge your friends for the best time and get your score into the global leaderboards.

Explore a virtual world


Explore a non-linear overworld. By beating levels you unlock new paths, find shops and uncover the mysteries of torus-space.
Ultratoro tells the story of a hacker infiltrating “Deusoft”, the biggest megacorporation in the world.

Unlock cars

Maneuver the cyberspace with style!
With the coins found in the enemy servers you can buy new cars.
Unlock every car shop and complete your collection.

Create and share levels with the community

Featuring an easy to use level editor, anyone can create their own tracks and share them with other players. With full controller support, these creative tools are seamlessly integrated into the main game.
